info.name: Housing Projects API
info.description: This section was made for developers use the API to get or post housing projects from Atlantico-Colombia. Type of request used mainly for suggestions (based on incomplete names). user just can make request if registered and logged in section.

request.description: This route returns a json with the data from all projects in the database. Just need to type the apikey.

StartFragment

The /search route will search the project database for a project that matches the city queried. Use the loc parameter to pass a location name.

  
EndFragment

Update the price of sale department at a particular project due to price change every year or during current year. Using the id and new_price parameters.

This request just is allowed by administration user.

url.raw: http://127.0.0.1:5002/add?api_key=TopSecretAPIKey&name=Aquanova&logo=https://ciudadmallorquin.com/images/logos/logo-aquanova.png&location=Ciudad Mallorquín&city=Puerto colombia&company=marval&address=Calle 100 con carrera 52 esquina - Barrio La Castellana&url_map=http://maps.google.com/?q=Norte%20de%20Barranquilla%20-%20Sala%20de%20Ventas%20VIP%20-%20Calle%20100%20con%20carrera%2052%20esquina%20-%20Barrio%20La%20Castellana&address_sale=Cra. 29 No.  45 – 45&contact=(607) 633 3987&stratum=3&area=46.99&price=175.000.000&type=vis&img_url=https://marval.com.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/marval-galeria-aquanova-01.jpg&description=El proyecto Aquanova, es un conjunto tipo VIS se encuentra ubicado en el desarrollo urbanístico Ciudad Mallorquín, en el municipio de Puerto Colombia al noroccidente del departamento del Atlántico. &url_website=https://marval.com.co/proyecto/aquanova/

query.value: Calle 100 con carrera 52 esquina - Barrio La Castellana
El proyecto Aquanova, es un conjunto tipo VIS se encuentra ubicado en el desarrollo urbanístico Ciudad Mallorquín, en el municipio de Puerto Colombia al noroccidente del departamento del Atlántico.

request.description: Adds a new project entry to the database. Requires authentication with api-key parameter.
Deletes a project from the database. You will need to provide the id of the project to delete as a route. This request just is allowed by administration user.
